page.title: 12Wick Printing Factory
page.content: In Wick Printing factory there are about a 100 employees are{60% Woman {and 40% Men. The Area of the actual factory is 50,000 sq ft. The screen printing is the{4th best in England.}The inputs of the factory are items like unfinished drawings and enlargement screen printing stencils. The outputs are finished designs, enlargements e.t.c The paper and brands are 50% Swedish. The Nylon screen material for printing designs is Â£12 a metre. The factory won a competion because it designed a squash ball holder. The hygenic conditions are very{good}in this particular factory. People with a strong sense of smell might find the odour overpowering.
